Package com.facebook.litho.animation

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Animated.AnimationBuilder
    Class that can create an AnimationBinding.
    AnimatedProperty
    A property on a mount item (View or Drawable), e.g.
    AnimationBinding
    An animation or set of animations using GraphBindings.
    AnimationBindingListener
    Listener that receives events when a GraphBinding is activated or is finished.
    AnimationForVarArgs
    Either a AnimationBinding or a builder that can create one.
    Resolver
    A class used to get and set the runtime values of mount items in the component hierarchy during animations.
    RuntimeValue
    Class that represents a float value that may need to be resolved at runtime (since it's relative to a property on a mount item for example).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Animated
    Utility class for building animated transitions.
    Animated.AbstractBuilder  
    Animated.AbstractPointBuilder  
    Animated.BezierBuilder  
    Animated.SpringBuilder  
    Animated.TimingBuilder  
    AnimatedComponent
    Base class to reference a component that can be animated.
    AnimatedProperties
    A convenience class for common View properties applicable to all subclasses of View.
    AnimatedPropertyNode
    A ValueNode that allows getting and/or setting the value of a specific property (x, y, scale, text color, etc) on a given mount item (View or Drawable).
    AppearingComponent
    Class used to reference a component that is appearing in a transition.
    AppearingDimensionComponentProperty
    A dimension property (x, y, width, height) on a component that is appearing.
    AppearingDimensionComponentProperty.TransitionBuilder  
    AppearingFloatComponentProperty
    A property (e.g.
    AppearingFloatComponentProperty.TransitionBuilder  
    AppearingPositionComponentProperty
    A dimension-pair property (x, y) on a component that is appearing.
    AppearingPositionComponentProperty.TransitionBuilder  
    BezierTransition
    Animation for the transition of the position of a mount item on a quadratic Bezier curve.
    ChangingComponent
    Reference to a component that has one or more properties changing in a transition.
    ComponentProperty
    Base class to reference a property on a component.
    CompositeComponentProperty
    Base class for a property that is actually backed by multiple float properties (e.g.
    DimensionComponentProperty
    A dimension property (x, y, width, height) on a component that is changing.
    DimensionComponentProperty.TransitionBuilder  
    DimensionValue
    A RuntimeValue for dimension properties like x/y/width/height.
    DisappearingComponent
    Class used to reference a component that is disappearing in a transition.
    DisappearingDimensionComponentProperty
    A dimension property (x, y, width, height) on a component that is disappearing.
    DisappearingDimensionComponentProperty.TransitionBuilder  
    DisappearingFloatComponentProperty
    A property (e.g.
    DisappearingFloatComponentProperty.TransitionBuilder  
    DisappearingPositionComponentProperty
    A dimension-pair property (x, y) on a component that is disappearing.
    DisappearingPositionComponentProperty.TransitionBuilder  
    FloatComponentProperty
    A property (e.g.
    FloatComponentProperty.TransitionBuilder  
    FloatValue
    A RuntimeValue for a float property like scale or alpha.
    ParallelBinding
    An AnimationBinding that's composed of other AnimationBindings running in parallel, possibly starting on a stagger.
    PositionComponentProperty
    A dimension-pair property (x, y) on a component that is changing.
    PositionComponentProperty.TransitionBuilder  
    SequenceBinding
    An AnimationBinding that's a sequence of other AnimationBindings.
    SpringTransition
    Animation for the transition of a single ComponentProperty on a spring.
    TimingTransition
    Animation for the transition of a single ComponentProperty over a fixed amount of time.
    TransitionAnimationBinding
    Base class for defining animations for transitions between states of the component hierarchy.
